markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Uncanny Cheeks](/Feats.aspx?ID=2430) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 55 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You squirrel away useful objects and seem to retrieve them at just the right time. You gain the [Prescient Consumable](/Feats.aspx?ID=2142) and [Prescient Planner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2143) feats, except that you always withdraw the objects from your cheek pouches. This means the object you retrieve must fit in your cheek pouches; this is generally an item of negligible Bulk unless you also have the [Cheek Pouches](/Feats.aspx?ID=1295) feat.
name: Uncanny Cheeks

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Uncanny Cheeks Source Ancestry Guide pg. 55 2.0 --- You squirrel away useful objects and seem to retrieve them at just the right time. You gain the Prescient Consumable and Prescient Planner feats, except that you always withdraw the objects from your cheek pouches. This means the object you retrieve must fit in your cheek pouches; this is generally an item of negligible Bulk unless you also have the Cheek Pouches feat.
